section.name: JavaMonitoring tool
section.p:
This framework provides a simple way for tracing and monitoring JavaApplication. The console uses a Servlet Container but the framework does't required anything else than a JVM (1.3+) and AspectJ into your application.
Exemples of console pages are available there.
